page.title: 15Queensbury Fire Station
page.content:
15 (Retained Firemen) work part time, they have other jobs in the daytime. The fire station is (open between 6pm( and 8am.)The men all have bleepers to call them for duty.
There is (one fire tender) that holds three hundred gallons of water and as a ladder on top.There is a vast amount of equipment ; hoses, axes, breathing apparatus, safety bleepers they turn on if trapped, ropes and torches different kinds of fires can be fought with water, powder, foam and sand.
(In 1984 there were 120 incidents; grassfires, housefires, floods and road accidents.There were some false alarms because people thought there was a fire,and some malicious false alarms.
